captions.text: They've captivated the world with their music
Now experience One Direction as you've never seen them before
In their first foreign language motion picture
Since the time of change
I am not believing my sadness days
Truthfully
I am left alone with no spoons or towels
And the rain is in my heart
We had knowledge of the old ones
Who rode upon the backs of tigers
But my brothers bruised me in the name of tradition
I spit on them all!
Yet the time approaches to face them once more
In a world that tore them apart
Only one thing could bring them back together
Shadow Pico!
Forgive me for the things I am must to do
I am the stone shark of prophecy
Ooh! Ooh! Ooh!
My car has no longer a working motor
It is said that blood must spill before the flower can bloom
Shadow Pico
I am sensing the presence of the brotherhood
Hear my words of truth, Shadow Pico!
"La la puah lay mohr
La cuo moar cheephra
Puah lay moar la quay moi"
The power grows
Oooh
Shadow Pico!
Shadow Pico
I'll put a ball through your scab.
Look, Zayn speaks of English to that maiden
I'll make you pay!

title: "SHADOW PICO trailer" — A Bad Lip Reading of One Direction
